column4: seagate external hard drive won't show up anymore, i removed it safely everytime and only used it on ubuntu 10.04, never windows. it was working 10 minutes ago and now it still lights up but wont show up for me to mount
open a terminal and do « tailf /var/log/messages » then plug the disk. paste the new lines that will show up
it looks like the disk is ok; do « udisks --mount /dev/sda1 »
